user_query: I'm planning a beach party for my friends and I need to estimate the cost. Can you calculate the payment for a loan of $3,000 with an interest rate of 4% over a period of 1 year? Also, provide me with the rho value for an option with a strike price of $75, a time-to-expiry of 6 months, and a risk-free rate of 3%?

TaskList.description: Calculate the monthly payment for a loan of $3,000 with an interest rate of 4% over 1 year.
Calculate the rho value for an option with a strike price of $75, time-to-expiry of 6 months, and a risk-free rate of 3%.
